about_the_game:
Driftland: The Magic Revival - Original Game Soundtrack

The music in Driftland adapts to in-game events, it's mixed in real time, and consists of many layers (stems). Each of the four races has individual music that emphasizes its character.
The soundtrack was mixed so that it would be a musical🎵 journey through the moods that you can experience during the game.

How to play downloaded Soundtrack DLC:
1. Please select Music from the Library tab in the Steam client.
2. From the list of available albums, choose Driftland: The Magic Revival - Soundtrack.
3. Press the PLAY ALBUM button to start the Steam music player

How to find Soundtrack files:
1. Please select Music from the Library tab in the Steam client.
2. From the list of available albums, choose Driftland: The Magic Revival - Soundtrack.
3. Choose the SHOW IN SYSTEM below PLAY ALBUM button to open the folder with the Soundtrack files in mp3 format.
